summary:
Sets some of Belethor\'s \'Hello\' lines to be played in random order, rather than
sequentially.
descriptionHtml:
Sets some of Belethor\'s \'Hello\' lines to be played in random order, rather than
sequentially.

By default he typically only gets the chance to speak his \"Everything\'s for sale
my friend\" line upon initiating conversation, and cycles lines upon consecutive
conversations. Unfortunately, the state of this greeting cycle resets rather
frequently, so you normally don\'t get to hear his full repertoire of sleezy
greetings.

By marking these lines as \'Random\', they\'ll be played in random order: the next
time you visit Whiterun\'s general merchant, he might be a bit more humble (or
even read your mind).

Not a perfect solution, as with priority of his personal lines set to the
default 70, he still speaks some generic hellos (pr. 30). This mod could
probably be improved by increasing his greetings\' priority to 100.
